homeHeader.title: Set Up, Manage, and Scale Your Auto Enterprise in Dubai — All from One Strategic Hub with Our Expert Support
homeHeader.description: Navigate Dubai Auto Zone’s stringent regulatory landscape, confusing industry-specific activities, and complex customs inspection with One Nexuz! We do all the heavy lifting, so you can focus on scaling your dealership across the Emirates! Gain unrestricted access to the Gulf Coast, Dubai International Airport, and the Jebel Ali Port for seamless import, export, and distribution of brand new or pre-loved cars across Asia, Africa, Europe, and the GCC in DUCAMZ Free Zone.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What licenses can I get in Dubai Auto Zone?
items.answer: You can choose from numerous specialised licenses, including trading and services to export, import, repair, inspect, maintain, and detail automobiles.

items.question: What documents will I need to register in DAZ Free Zone?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need passport copies, an Emirates ID or Residence Visa, an MOA, a lease agreement, and a trade name, depending on your legal entity and selected business activity.

items.question: What legal entities can I set up in Dubai Auto Zone?
items.answer: You can choose one of three business structures, including a Free Zone Establishment, a Free Zone Company, or a branch of either a foreign or UAE-based company.

items.question: How long does licensing take in Dubai Auto Zone Free Zone?
items.answer: Licensing in DAZ can take 1-14 days, depending on your selected license, office space, and document readiness.

items.question: Can One Nexuz assist me in opening a personal or corporate bank account in DAZ Free Zone?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our experts boast a network of reliable banking partners, expediting setup times to streamline your finances.
